text: Gladiator is a 2000 Anglo-American historical action movie directed by Ridley Scott and produced by Douglas Wick, David Franzoni and Branko Lustig. It stars Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Richard Harris, Connie Nielsen, Djimon Hounsou and Oliver Reed. It won five Academy Awards. A sequel, Gladiator 2, is expected to be released on November 22, 2024. == Plot == Commodus (Joaquin Phoenix) takes power after he murders his father, Emperor Marcus Aurelius (Richard Harris), the great stoical philosopher, and strips rank from Maximus (Russell Crowe), one of the favored generals of Marcus Aurelius. Maximus then becomes a slave and has to fight to the death in the gladiator arenas, while he plans his revenge on Commodus for murdering his wife and son. == References == == Other websites == * Category:2000 action movies Category:2000 drama movies Category:2000s historical movies Category:2000s epic movies Category:American action movies Category:American drama movies Category:American epic movies Category:BAFTA Award winners Category:British action movies Category:British drama movies Category:Best Picture Oscar Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Ancient Rome Category:Movies set in Rome Category:Movies set in Vienna Category:Movies set in Spain Category:Movies set in Africa Category:Movies set in the 2nd century Category:Movies about revenge Category:Movies about rebellions Category:Movies about slavery Category:Incest in movies Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer Category:Movies directed by Ridley Scott Category:Golden Globe Award winners Category:DreamWorks Pictures movies Category:Universal Pictures movies
